definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Reuben, Roubhn[in] (be-hold a son! but Ge 29:32 makes = [[רָאָה בְּעָנְיִי]] (!); Jos:Ant. i. 19, 7 al. Roubhlov, SyrVer ruwbiyl, ´[[ר]]: then perh. = Ar. riyba0lun, lion, cf. Di);—

eldest son of Jacob and Leah Ge 29:32, Ge 30:14 + 11 t. Gn, Ex 1:2, 1Ch 2:1; as head of family or clan Ex 6:14, Ex 6:14, Nu 1:20, Nu 26:5 (all P), 1Ch 5:1, 1Ch 5:3, cf. ´[[בְּנֵי אֱלִיאָב בֶּן־רְא]]: De 11:6.

as name of clan or tribe Ju Jdg 5:15, Jdg 5:16, De 27:13, Jos 18:7 ( +[[גׇּד]]; both D), De 33:6 (poem), Ez Eze 48:6, Eze 48:7, Eze 48:31, Nu 1:5 (P); so ´[[מַטֵּה ר]]: Nu 1:21, Nu 13:4, Jos 20:8, Jos 21:7 (all P), 1Ch 6:48, 1Ch 6:63, ´[[מַחֲנֵה ר]]: Nu 2:10, Nu 2:16, Nu 10:18 (all P); ´[[בְּנֵי ר]]:, as tribe, Nu 16:1 Nu 32:37 (both JE), Nu 2:10, Nu 7:20, Nu 26:5, Jos 13:23, Jos 13:23 (all P), also (+ Gad and oft. Manasseh) Nu 32:1, Nu 32:2, Nu 32:6, Nu 32:25 (JE), Jos 4:12 (D), Nu 32:29, Nu 32:31, Nu 32:33, Jos 22:9 + 11 t. 22 (all P), cf. 1Ch 5:18; ´[[בֶּן־ר]]: as tribe Jos 15:6, Jos 18:7 (both P), [[מַטֵּה]] ´[[בְנֵי־ ר]]: Jos 13:15 (P).
